com.amplifyframework.datastore.storage.sqlite

Class SQLiteModelFieldTypeConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amplifyframework.datastore.storage.sqlite.SQLiteModelFieldTypeConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelFieldTypeConverter<android.database.Cursor,Model>

    public final class SQLiteModelFieldTypeConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ModelFieldTypeConverter<android.database.Cursor,Model>
    ModelField value converter for SQLite. It converts from SQLite's Cursor to Model properties and from Model properties to values that are valid in a SQLiteStatement.

    • Method Summary

      java.lang.Object convertValueFromTarget(Model model, ModelField field)
      Converts a specific ModelField from the T to a value compatible with the S type.
